name: Iceberg Calamity
description:
Re-imagining of NICE with better graphics and few different features, including improved ice breaking, game modes instead of random events and more!

CONTROLS:
WASD / Arrow keys / D-pad / Joysticks - Movement
W / Up arrow key / Z / F / A button / X button - Jump
S / Down arrow key / X / G / B button / Y button - Place Ice
Enter / Start - Play / Pause / Restart the game
` / Select - Screenshot download

UNLOCKS:
20+ highscore on Default mode - unlock Icicles mode (Icicles drop after crystal collection and destroy everything they fall on... even iceberg itself and a player!)
20+ highscore on Icicles mode - unlock Cleanup mode (Ice darkens after crystal collection (blue > purple > dark blue) and player dies if he leaves dark blue ice when collecting crystal)
